Title: The Determining Acts of Her Life
Writer: Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Lucy Maud Montgomery (based on "Anne of Green Gables"), Amanda Fahey, Alina Mankin (executive story editor), Kathryn Borel (executive story editor)
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Dalila Bela
Plot: A game of spin the bottle prompts burning questions about love and beauty. Anne and Cole bond over their differences as Gilbert makes his way home.
